title: krishnaverma
author: krishnaverma
content: I have seen new investors being carried out by seeing the success of big bitcoin investors. But , this is wrong approach in my opinion. Because, I personally feel that most of the people fail and they will never share their story. So, most of the stories that new guy searches , he will find only good success stories. But that is not correct overall picture. One should keep the limitations of crypto in mind as well. What is your opinion about this ?

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on June 01, 2024, 03:42:27 AMI have seen new investors being carried out by seeing the success of big bitcoin investors. But , this is wrong approach in my opinion. Because, I personally feel that most of the people fail and they will never share their story.Most of people lose money in the market as traders or investors and even successful investors do have times when they made mistakes, bad decisions, bad capital and risk management so that they got losses, even big losses.If you notice, actual successful and honest investors, through their speeches will sometimes share their painful lessons from their past losses. Because they can not be mediocre speakers and educators if they don't share their losses, lessons they learned with newbies who want to learn from them.If any successful investor only says about success, there is hidden fact the person does not want to say and it's hard to trust him or her words.Warren Buffett’s failures: 15 investing mistakes he regrets

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on June 01, 2024, 03:42:27 AMI have seen new investors being carried out by seeing the success of big bitcoin investors. But , this is wrong approach in my opinion. Because, I personally feel that most of the people fail and they will never share their story. So, most of the stories that new guy searches , he will find only good success stories. But that is not correct overall picture. One should keep the limitations of crypto in mind as well. What is your opinion about this ?In my own estimation, I think that investors are more likely to share a story about a loss than about profits in bitcoin. Their stories of loss are everywhere on the internet - on blogs, forums, Twitter, Facebook, and other social media platforms. And they do it for two reasons which may be intentional or not. They are, to garner sympathy from the public and secondly for it to serve as a example to new investors to carry out a thorough research and understand the market before they make any investment. I would say that for security reasons most investors unless the big ones are very hesitant to share their bitcoin success stories.

comments.author: blckhawk
comments.body: Totally agree, behind all of the success in those stories, there's a lot of heartache, tragedies, and mistakes but they never tell that because that part of the story of that successful person isn't exactly inspiring for people to know about. Never get to carried away listening or reading about these stories, most of the time, it's the fault of the people that would read these stories that they fail miserably in what they want to achieve, they're already an adult that can think for themselves and they should know by now how life for each individual is going to be different no matter what and it's already a common sense that these stories serves as an inspiration and not the exact blueprint to a successful life.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: You should read their stories and learn from them. Yes they become rich because they were mostly lucky but they also had curiosity which is as important as being lucky. That’s what I learned from these stories at least. Just because you read them, doesn’t mean you will be like them and some if those rich people went broke later too so there is that. Meaning, everyone has a unique story even though they look alike at the first glance. In the end you should focus on what you are doing instead of having too much interest in what other people do. Otherwise you’ll lose your own way.People read books to learn from other people’s mistakes and experiences but only a few actually learn something unless they experience the same stuff themselves. Reading a story doesn’t affect their thinking in any way. Then obviously reading a book is a waste of time for these people. They can read lorem ipsum and they won’t notice a difference.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Because there are only two reasons why most people fall investing in Bitcoin, one is panic selling and another one is hold the coins in centralized sites.So if there are people who want to success by investing in Bitcoin, they need to learn how to hold their coins for few years and secure their coins in non custodial wallet.Although there are also many successful Bitcoin investors, but successful people value their privacy. When I hear someone claimed if he's successful by investing in Bitcoin, I'm really skeptic, if he didn't sign a message, I won't trust his claim.

comments.author: pinggoki
comments.body: I don't know about you people but I don't get how you can fall for this kind of story, most of them only serve be an inspirational thing after all so I'm not quite sure what kind of people fall for this supposed to be feel good stories. @blckhawk is right, each individuals have different lives and I believe that, in my opinion, it should be where you're allowed to have a different and unique lives, living as a clone of someone or a shadow of someone that you idolize isn't really an appealing thing to do not to mention that it's not that fulfilling for you to do so.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on June 01, 2024, 03:42:27 AMI have seen new investors being carried out by seeing the success of big bitcoin investors. But , this is wrong approach in my opinion. Because, I personally feel that most of the people fail and they will never share their story. So, most of the stories that new guy searches , he will find only good success stories. But that is not correct overall picture. One should keep the limitations of crypto in mind as well. What is your opinion about this ?No one is completely perfect; from the beginning of the crypto journey, no one knows if it will be as it is today. There were a lot of bad investment decisions back then, and a lot of people were also lucky. If you go online and check out anyone sharing their success stories about Bitcoin investment and do not add about how they failed on multiple occasions, then the person is not entirely to be trusted, and the information given out by him might all be fabricated.  If you read a lot of the success stories about investment and trading, if you read them very well from the beginning, you will notice that they first start by talking about their past mistakes and their determination. Knowing what they want is what keeps them pushing further until they arrive at the level that warrants them sharing their success stories.

comments.author: Reatim
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on June 01, 2024, 03:42:27 AMBecause, I personally feel that most of the people fail and they will never share their story.You’re right but an investor should be the one responsible for searching both the good and the bad in bitcoin. They should know that there really are risks involved and that they shouldn’t really believe in everything they see in social media or in the internet. We can’t prevent people from sharing their success stories and personally it gives me lots of hope too. But I also know it’s not all like that so I try to control the hope.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on June 01, 2024, 03:42:27 AMI have seen new investors being carried out by seeing the success of big bitcoin investors. But , this is wrong approach in my opinion. Because, I personally feel that most of the people fail and they will never share their story. So, most of the stories that new guy searches , he will find only good success stories. But that is not correct overall picture. One should keep the limitations of crypto in mind as well. What is your opinion about this ?We can derive inspiration from the success stories of others but we shouldn't assume that it was a smooth ride for all. Reading these success stories serves as a motivation for people to keep hodling regardless of the FUD that is spreading in the crypto space. However, anyone who assumes that everyone who invested in Bitcoin made a profit is either blinded by ignorance or greed. It is only a small percentage of investors made a fortune from Bitcoin. Many of them sold or lost their hodling before the price increased. New investors are advised not to focus only on the benefit of investing in the sector but they should also consider the risks involved.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on June 01, 2024, 03:42:27 AMI have seen new investors being carried out by seeing the success of big bitcoin investors. But , this is wrong approach in my opinion. Because, I personally feel that most of the people fail and they will never share their story. So, most of the stories that new guy searches , he will find only good success stories. But that is not correct overall picture. One should keep the limitations of crypto in mind as well. What is your opinion about this ?No doubt that Bitcoin investors have enough good stories to tell and testimonies to share. This is however not the oldest and older stories alone but also the most recent ones, yes, I mean the ones that happened in less than a year. This is because Bitcoin is the epitome of testimonies, it happens daily, except that it is not everybody who will be able to share such a testimony for many reasons whether is caused by Bitcoin or not. But, if you use the aggression of the oldest stories of Bitcoin investors to judge and hence invest with that mindset, you will be making a whole lot of mistakes because, the coin was very low in price at that time, so some people even made more than x73000 of their investment in it.The fact now is that can that happen again? This is the reality that anyone trying to invest in Bitcoin should take into consideration. The price of Bitcoin is high now, it takes wisdom and good speculative power to earn from it. People may still invest and gain money easily through it, but be sure that it can't earn you as multiple as you might have read online, no, that can only be in your dreams and imagination as Bitcoin may even find it difficult to move past $100,000 in this bullish cycle and I wonder what its fate would be in the bearish cycle coming.So no one should entrap themselves in the name of the success story of Bitcoin as the conditions are no longer the same, or else they will regret it.

What is your opinion about this ?Another way to describe it or consider everything that appears is just reference information and verify for yourself, this market has a truth that most people lose money  But then they will also realize the journey to success without depending on others, as if your life is yours to live yourself and no one will live for you.

comments.author: Litzki1990
comments.body: Many investors succeed in investing in Bitcoin and there are some investors who do not succeed. If you are successful in investing then you must share your investment success story here so that others will be inspired to invest. One's success story motivates us, it doesn't mean that I will be successful if I do business like him or invest like him.  Basically, there are many stories behind achieving success in investment, those stories may be unknown to many. After an investor invests, only that investor knows how much they struggle with that investment. Those who overcome difficult challenges and hold on to the investment in the end, but those who do not understand anything related to investment, only invest and within a few days they get excited and sell the investment, but in this case, they have very little chance of achieving success. Before investing by listening to the success stories of others, one must know about the investment, its risks and what can happen after investing.

comments.author: $weetne$$
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on June 01, 2024, 03:42:27 AMI have seen new investors being carried out by seeing the success of big bitcoin investors. But , this is wrong approach in my opinion. Because, I personally feel that most of the people fail and they will never share their story. So, most of the stories that new guy searches , he will find only good success stories. But that is not correct overall picture. One should keep the limitations of crypto in mind as well. What is your opinion about this ?There is no success story that do not have its challenge but people do not talk about the challenges but only the results. For you to become successful you have to pass through many failures therefore we should not only be expecting good results when we invest in Bitcoin. Sometimes the market will fall and if you do not have patience you will be tempted to sell. Some investors did not keep their Bitcoin safe and they lost it so you have to be very protective of your Bitcoin so you do not lose them. We have to learn from all the stories that we heard as it will help us to become successful too. Listening to their success stories should motivate you to want to be like them and prepare you for the worst that you are going to encounter. To avoid losing you should do the things that are right by not storing your Bitcoin on exchange but buy a hardware wallet and keep all your Bitcoins in them.

What is your opinion about this ?That's what we call people being attracted to the success of other people, and because of that they will try it brcause they are also hoping that they can earn or be successful which is sometimes ends up being bad or that person meet its downfall, I mean many people are just swayed by other peoples successful and they hope that they will also have the same experience or success, which is the cause of people becoming hateful to the person that inspire them to invest, little reminder the one that cause someones miserable or losses is that person also, there's no one to be blamed. That's why I dont want to mention to anyone I know about my success or profit in bitcoin because I don't want to inspire someone that I will know to most likely blame me if something went wrong, its better to be lowkey and invest peacefully.

comments.author: stadus
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on June 01, 2024, 03:42:27 AMI have seen new investors being carried out by seeing the success of big bitcoin investors. But , this is wrong approach in my opinion. Because, I personally feel that most of the people fail and they will never share their story. So, most of the stories that new guy searches , he will find only good success stories. But that is not correct overall picture. One should keep the limitations of crypto in mind as well. What is your opinion about this ?Know that behind those success, there’s always inevitable mistakes and losses that the investor endure first before he finally reach the end success. I think that is already known by all potential investors, as everyone started with a scratch until one enhanced his knowledge and skills and apply on his own investment. So I don’t think these new investors just got carried away, they’re probably aware already those sacrifices and losses first before they decide to invest in bitcoin.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Those who fail to invest in Bitcoin will not tell others about their failure. But maybe he just shared his failure with those closest to him and said don't invest in Bitcoin because it could make you lose your money. Many have failed to invest in Bitcoin, but many have succeeded and made big profits.Maybe beginners or new investors more often find someone's success story from investing in Bitcoin. But if he just goes along with it without learning more about Bitcoin, he probably won't have a chance to make a profit. They should also look for information about mistakes made by other new investors so they can avoid making the same mistakes.A new investor needs to learn about investing in Bitcoin before he starts. There are many things he needs to know, and he must do this to avoid making mistakes like others. They must be able to understand investing in Bitcoin so that their opportunity to make profits can be greater than that of other people.

comments.author: Dr.Osh
comments.body: I think it is a common thing to tell or share someone's success story in a field. This usually motivates someone to enter the business world if they are really interested. However, what you need to realize is that this is not easy. There will be risks that can be found in any investment. Therefore, wise investors will try to do research before investing. So, it is very natural for someone to look for motivation to enter and be serious about something.

comments.author: legendbtc
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 01, 2024, 04:04:12 AMQuote from: krishnaverma on June 01, 2024, 03:42:27 AMI have seen new investors being carried out by seeing the success of big bitcoin investors. But , this is wrong approach in my opinion. Because, I personally feel that most of the people fail and they will never share their story. So, most of the stories that new guy searches , he will find only good success stories. But that is not correct overall picture. One should keep the limitations of crypto in mind as well. What is your opinion about this ?In my own estimation, I think that investors are more likely to share a story about a loss than about profits in bitcoin. Their stories of loss are everywhere on the internet - on blogs, forums, Twitter, Facebook, and other social media platforms. And they do it for two reasons which may be intentional or not. They are, to garner sympathy from the public and secondly for it to serve as a example to new investors to carry out a thorough research and understand the market before they make any investment. I would say that for security reasons most investors unless the big ones are very hesitant to share their bitcoin success stories. I will divide into 2 types of investors. For those who regularly share their losses in the market, what they want is to give a warning to newbies rather than seek sympathy. Because most of us come to the market to make profits, not to seek sympathy or friends. The second type of investors are those who often share huge profits, talk about their philosophy of life and say they like to help others… often people without good intentions. These people want us to join their signal group, sell courses or entrust investments...So we should be more wary of these types of investors than type 1. You are right in thinking that big investors often do not like to appear in public, but not everyone chooses to stay silent and ignore the community. Many people still join social networks to share experiences and make market predictions because joining social networks like Facebook or X does not require them to reveal their identity to the community.

comments.author: Yamifoud
comments.body: Not all success stories are fake, some of them are true. If all in our minds is not true, I don't think we need to start discussing Bitcoin or remain in the forum. Because I believe there are great stories, it is just people love to share their experiences and make proud of themselves. But yes, it is our opinion to think if that is real or not, we can use our instinct as well. Perhaps, we listen to them but do not urge ourselves to fall in love with their stories too quickly. Why not try to see the real thing happen because who knows, we will be successful. Because we can't tell if they are telling the truth or not until we do it personally. In fact, it was proven already that BTC is profitable.
